overview:
Deana Esmail is the founder and Chief Creative Officer of Delusha.com.

Deana Esmail, was born and raised in Denver, Colorado. She received a degree in Interior Design from ACC in Colorado in 2000. After getting married in 2000, she moved to Valencia, Spain and started working for a prestigous home furnishing company. During her tenure, she was responsible for product development and merchandising. One of her product designs was awarded the prestigious â€œNouvelles Decouvertesâ€ at the Maison & Objet (Paris) home decorations show.

After giving birth to her first son, she decided to become a full time stay at home Mom. 5 years and two children later, Deana decided it was time to start something of her own that involved something she loves: fashion. Deana founded www.delusha.com in early 2010.

Drawing on her creative and personal experiences she wanted to create a place where women could express their creativity as well as empower themselves.
